function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear disinfection methodology for built environments","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection may lead to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Clarify and standardize disinfection methods for consistency and effectiveness","Technologies":"Standardized UVGI systems, ventilation rate controls","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and health authorities"},{"Description":"Variability in published data on UV irradiation of coronaviruses","Impact":"Difficulty in making valid comparisons and drawing conclusions","Mitigation":"Adopt a standardized approach to UV studies for consistent data interpretation","Technologies":"Standardized experimental methods, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
